refnamediv.refpurpose: Making use of Cookies within HTTP_Request.

refsect1.title: How to add Cookie to a HTTP request

example.title: Adding a cookie to the request
example.para: In this example a cookie named version is added to the HTTP request. The value of this cookie is the version string of the PHP interpreter that is running the instance of HTTP_Request.
